abstract: Even as other potential buyers circle Saab, Beijing Automotive Industry Holding has struck a tentative agreement for the right to produce several of the beleaguered Swedish manufacturer’s models, The New York Times reported.
snippet: Even as other potential buyers circle Saab, Beijing Automotive Industry Holding has struck a tentative agreement for the right to produce several of the beleaguered Swedish manufacturer’s models, The New York Times reported.
lead_paragraph: Even as other potential buyers circle Saab, Beijing Automotive Industry Holding has struck a tentative agreement for the right to produce several of the beleaguered Swedish manufacturer’s models, Nelson D. Schwartz of The New York Times reported Sunday.

headline.main: Chinese Firm Strikes Deal to Produce Saab Models
